entities.name: weasleys

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the Weasleys and is being scolded by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is intervening in a conversation between Ron and Harry.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill Weasley has already been scarred.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George Weasley has lost an ear.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being defensive about his parents and is yelling at Ron.

entities.name: spattergroit
entities.description: Spattergroit is a disease that Harry claims to have.
